content: People have said this before, but i really think we should NOT put a tw for periods. It's perfectly natural, and putting "tw periods" does NOT help normalize them. While i can see how they can be triggering, I feel normalizing them so they don't trigger people is more important. I feel a TW should not be needed if somebody says "ugh im on my period". But if someone specifically mentions bleeding, then a tw can be provided, but for BLOOD, not periods
